Sky Sports' in studio referee Dermot Gallagher has blasted Devante Cole's challenge on Jeremie Frimpong in Celtic 's win over Motherwell on Sunday. 
The full-back was left in a heap after the Englis… [+1364 chars]

articles.author: Tyrone Marshall
articles.title: Two players are showing Manchester United the value of squad depth - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Man Utd have improved the competition for places in their squad over the summer and that is resulting in improved performances from some players.
articles.content: When the issue of Manchester United's squad depth is raised after the win at Everton on Saturday it is the sight of Paul Pogba and Edinson Cavani coming on together with eight minutes to go that stic… [+4446 chars]
